General.Name: Euro Trend Yatirim Ortakligi AS
General.Description: Euro Trend Yatirim Ortakligi A.S. manages the portfolio of capital market instruments. It also monitors the developments related to securities, financial markets, institutions, and partnerships for portfolio management. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Ankara, Turkey.
General.Address: Oguzlar Mah. Ceyhun Atif Kansu Cad. No:66 Kat: 2 Balgat, Ankara, Turkey
